hero_description: Enjoy the finest dishes of Uzbek and European cuisine. Make every moment special with us.
hero_restaurant_subtitle: Discover the best dishes and unforgettable atmosphere.
featured_dishes_subtitle: Discover our most loved dishes, chosen by our valued guests.
featured_dishes_description: Discover an amazing selection of dishes carefully chosen by our chef

testimonial_1.name: Ana De Armas
testimonial_1.title: Food Critic, NY Times
testimonial_1.content: Everest Restaurant delivers an unparalleled dining experience. Each dish is a masterpiece that tells a story of culinary excellence and innovation.

testimonial_2.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonial_2.title: Celebrity Chef
testimonial_2.content: The attention to detail and flavor complexity at Everest Restaurant is extraordinary. This is fine dining at its absolute peak.

testimonial_3.name: Emma Thompson
testimonial_3.title: Luxury Travel Blogger
testimonial_3.content: From the ambiance to the last bite, Everest Restaurant provides an unforgettable journey. Worth every star in its collection.

testimonial_quote_1: Every dish here is a work of art! Excellent service and a charming atmosphere. I will definitely come back!
testimonial_quote_2: A great place for dinner. Romantic ambiance and delicious food. Especially, the steaks melt in your mouth.
testimonial_quote_3: We came for lunch with the family. Loved that there is a special menu for kids. Highly recommend to everyone!
cta_title: Join Our Community of Food Enthusiasts
cta_description: Experience the difference that has made Everest Rest a destination for culinary excellence
cta_success: Thank you for joining our community!
footer_description: Everest Restaurant is a harmony of elegance and unique taste. We offer you the best dishes of Uzbek and European cuisine. Spend unforgettable moments in our cozy and modern atmosphere.
footer_about_us_text: Everest is not just food, it's an art. We strive to create unforgettable experiences for every guest.
menu_description: Discover our collection of premium dishes crafted by world-class chefs
reservations_login_title: Please login to make a reservation
reservations_description: Secure your place for an extraordinary dining experience
reservations_success_toast_description: We've received your reservation request and will confirm it shortly.
reservations_fail_toast_description: There was an error submitting your reservation.
reservations_login_required_toast_descri: Please login to make a reservation.
reservations_login_required_description: Please login to make a reservation.
reservations_policy_description: Reservations can be made up to 30 days in advance. We hold reservations for 15 minutes past the scheduled time.
reservations_cancellation_description: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before your reservation to avoid a cancellation fee.
reservations_large_parties_description: For parties of 8 or more, please contact us directly so we can accommodate your needs.
reservations_description_paid: A fee of 20.000 UZS per guest is required to secure your table. This ensures a premium experience for all our diners.
reservations_success_toast_description_p: Your reservation for {{count}} people has been confirmed and paid. Total: ${{price}}.
contact_description: We're here to answer any questions you may have about our experiences
contact_map_description: We're working on integrating a real map for your convenience
contact_success_toast_description: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.
contact_error_toast_description: Failed to send message. Please try again.
contact_admin_reply_toast_description: You have received a reply to your message
login_description: Sign in to access your account
login_fail_toast_description: Please check your credentials and try again.
login_form_email_error: Please enter a valid email address.
register_description: Join our community and start your culinary journey
register_fail_toast_description: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character
register_code_sent_desc: Please check your email for the verification code.
register_success_description: Your account has been successfully created.
admin_products_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
admin_reservations_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this reservation?
toast_added_to_favorites_desc: {{name}} has been added to your favorites.
toast_removed_from_favorites_desc: {{name}} has been removed from your favorites.
cart_login_prompt: Please login to view your cart
cart_description: Your selected items and order summary
cart_terms_notice: By proceeding, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
cart_empty_desc: Your cart is empty. Go to menu and select delicious dishes!
liked_login_prompt: Please login to view your favorites
liked_empty_description: You haven't added any items to favorites yet. Go to menu and discover delicious dishes!
product_spring_rolls_desc: Vegetable-filled rolls with a sweet chili dip.
product_bruschetta_desc: Toasted bread with fresh tomatoes, garlic, and basil.
product_grilled_salmon_desc: Salmon fillet with asparagus and lemon-dill sauce.
product_beef_steak_desc: Juicy ribeye served with roasted potatoes.
product_choco_lava_desc: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center.
product_cheesecake_desc: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.
product_margherita_pizza_desc: Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
product_pepperoni_pizza_desc: Spicy pepperoni with mozzarella and tomato sauce.
about_subtitle: Everest Restaurant — a harmony of elegance and innovation.
about_experience_p1: Since 2010, we have delighted guests with the finest dishes.
about_experience_p2: Our chefs put their heart and skill into every dish.
about_experience_p3: Every guest is special to us.
about_vision_text: To be the best restaurant in Uzbekistan and worldwide.
about_mission_text: To provide every guest with unforgettable food and service.
about_timeline2_desc: In 2013, we received our first gastronomic award.
about_timeline3_desc: In 2016, a new branch was opened.
about_timeline4_desc: In 2019, new technologies were introduced to the menu.
about_cta_text: Discover new tastes and experiences with us.
checkout_subtitle: Fill in the details and complete your order
checkout_login_required_desc: Please log in to complete your order.
checkout_success_desc: Order number: {{orderId}}. We will contact you soon.
checkout_error_desc: An error occurred while creating the order. Please try again.
checkout_order_type_pickup_desc: Pick up products at your table in the restaurant
checkout_pickup_reservation_desc: Choose which table you are sitting at
checkout_pickup_error_desc: Reservation selection is required for pickup at restaurant
checkout_payme_description: Most convenient payment system in Uzbekistan
checkout_payme_note: Payment is processed through Payme system. Secure and fast.
career_intro: At Everest Restaurant, we believe that our team is the heart of our success. We are always looking for passionate, dedicated, and talented individuals to join our family. Explore the opportunities to grow with us.
why_work_here_p1: We offer a dynamic and supportive environment where you can hone your skills and build a rewarding career in the culinary arts. We are committed to the growth of our employees.
why_work_here_p2: Enjoy competitive salaries, health benefits, and the chance to work alongside some of the most creative minds in the industry.
form_cover_letter_placeholder: Tell us why you'd be a great fit for our team...

mybookings_delete_reservation_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this reservation?

cart_empty_desc: Your cart is empty. Go to menu and select delicious dishes!
about_mini_text: Everest Restaurant is not just food, it's an experience. Every bite, every service, and every atmosphere is created for you to love.
popular_dishes_subtitle: Try your favorites, specially selected for you.
testimonial_quote_1: Every dish here is a work of art! Excellent service and a charming atmosphere. I will definitely come back!
testimonial_quote_2: A great place for dinner. Romantic ambiance and delicious food. Especially, the steaks melt in your mouth.
testimonial_quote_3: We came for lunch with the family. Loved that there is a special menu for kids. Highly recommend to everyone!
location_subtitle: Easy to find us. We're waiting for you!
privacy_policy_information_collect_desc: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a reservation, place an order, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and payment information.
privacy_policy_how_use_desc: We use the information we collect to:
privacy_policy_how_use_communicate: Communicate with you about your orders
privacy_policy_how_use_promotions: Send you promotional materials (with your consent)
privacy_policy_how_use_improve: Improve our services and user experience
privacy_policy_sharing_desc: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business.
privacy_policy_security_desc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy_policy_contact_desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
privacy_policy_updates_desc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
admin_users_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.

register_validation_name_min: Name must be at least 2 characters.
register_validation_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
register_validation_password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters.
register_validation_terms_required: You must agree to the terms and conditions to continue.
terms_of_service_description: Terms and conditions for using Everest Restaurant services
terms_acceptance_content: By using the Everest Restaurant website, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website.
terms_service_description_content: Everest Restaurant provides the following services:
terms_registration_content: Registration is required to use some of our services.
terms_registration_requirement_4: Must be 18 or older or have parental consent
terms_ordering_content: The ordering process consists of the following steps:
terms_ordering_step_2: Add to cart and specify quantity
terms_ordering_step_4: Choose payment method and complete payment
terms_payment_content: We accept the following payment methods:
terms_reservations_content: Please follow these rules for table booking:
terms_reservations_rule_1: Make reservations at least 2 hours in advance
terms_reservations_rule_2: Arrive no later than 15 minutes after the scheduled time
terms_reservations_rule_3: Notify us 24 hours in advance to cancel reservations
terms_user_responsibility_3: Use for legal and legitimate purposes
terms_privacy_content: Your privacy is important to us. For detailed information about how we collect and use your data, please read our
terms_liability_content: Everest Restaurant provides its services 'as is'. We disclaim all liability and do not guarantee that users will not suffer direct or indirect damages.
terms_changes_content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of changes and new terms will take effect from the date they are announced.
terms_contact_content: If you have questions about these terms, please contact us:
reservations_created_description: Your reservation has been created successfully. Please proceed with payment.
payment_success_redirect: Payment successful! You will be redirected automatically.
payment_method_description: Most trusted payment system in Uzbekistan
payment_info_secure: All payments are secure and encrypted
payment_info_support: Contact us if you have any issues
